4.post_text:
You’ve got Tokyo. Now unlock the ultimate destination – Munich, with 1,200 comments! Simply tag a friend for a chance to win a pair of return air tickets to the heart of Bavaria at http://bit.ly/BMW1SeriesShareItFurther. 

To celebrate the launch of the all-new BMW 1 Series, every comment in our “Share it Further” contest will help to bring one lucky winner and a friend to Bali, Hong Kong, Tokyo or Munich with an exclusive BMW Plant Tour. Contest ends on 6th September 2015. Terms and conditions apply. 

With upgrades from its exterior to its interior, the all-new BMW 1 Series is the only rear-wheel drive hatchback in its class. Its diesel-powered engine is also capable of achieving a range of 1,220km at full capacity. Experience sheer driving pleasure that’s truly worth sharing at our VivoCity roadshow, from now till 30th August. #L1feworthsharing

10.post_text:
To celebrate the launch of the all-new BMW 1 Series, we’re giving away a pair of return air tickets to Bali, Hong Kong, Tokyo or Munich (with an exclusive BMW Plant Tour)! 

Simply tag ONE friend whom you want to take on this trip in the comments below. More comments unlock more locations (200 for Bali, 400 for Hong Kong, 800 for Tokyo and 1,200 for Munich)! Contest runs from 21st August 2015 to 6th September 2015. 

Take your luck further. Visit www.pml-bmw.com.sg/shareitfurther for a chance to win a weekend test drive of the BMW 1 Series in Singapore. Terms and conditions apply. #L1feworthsharing

comments.message: We have reached 800 comments and Tokyo has been unlocked. We are just 400 comments away from the ultimate destination — Munich with an exclusive BMW Plant Tour. Remember to tag your friend in the comments section of this post and not on the photo. All the best! :)

We made it! We have reached 1,200 comments and Munich has been unlocked. One lucky winner will stand to win a pair of return air tickets to Munich and an exclusive BMW Plant Tour. For those who have not participated in this contest, you still have a chance too! Contest ends on 6 September 2015 and the winner will be announced on our Facebook page on 9 September 2015. Stay tuned! :)

We have unlocked Hong Kong and we are on our way to reaching Tokyo (800 comments) and Munich with an exclusive BMW Plant Tour (1200 comments)! Remember to tag your friend in the comments below and not on the photo. Good luck everyone! :)

Bali has been unlocked! We need a total of 400 comments to unlock Hong Kong, 800 comments for Tokyo, and 1200 comments for Munich (with an exclusive BMW Plant Tour), so start tagging a friend on this post if you haven't done so! And don't forget to tag your friend in the comments below and not on the photo. All the best! :)

Thank you all for your active participation! We have selected our winner who wins a pair of return air tickets to Munich with an exclusive BMW Plant Tour. Find out if you are the lucky winner here: http://on.fb.me/1ix5DU2

comments.message: In the showroom now. Looks decent and sporty ! It is meant for 4 adults plus 1 child due to space constraints. Free 3 years parts and labour at $133,800
There is a typo error how can it be 166/month
Hi , do you mine sharing more about the easy finance scheme ?
Is easy finance applicable for other models? PM me pls. Thx you.
Care to share more on your easy finance scheme?
Which model is that ?
Lol... Maybe first 12mths at $166/mth. After that $3-4k/mth for the following installments...
Yup $166 a month after you probably pay 90% of the car value as down payment!

So this is how it works: you get a 5-yr loan and pay 50% down payment. One of the 5 years, you pay only interest which is $166 per month. The remaining 4 years, you pay adjusted full instalment per month, which I'm sure wouldn't be low.
To think you can get away with the high interest with 166 bucks a month is so ignorant.
Why not go down and test drive.. Do note, it is a Rear Wheel Drive...
Can I know any deposit needed and monthly installment only $166 ?
